transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji Radhakrishna Enterprise company mein baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ji ji sir.
Customer: Ji sir Vishal baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ke office se sir. Kaise hain?
Customer: Sir welcome welcome sab badhiya hai sir Vishal sir.
Executive: Aapne call kiya tha sir abhi hamare customer care number pe?
Customer: Ji ji kiya tha main kya hua sir main IndiaMART se la raha tha. Registration bhi hai kya hai ki mobile jo hai mera gir gaya tha.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Mobile jo hai na mera gir gaya tha.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ah to main kafi din se lagbhag ho gaya abhi saat aath din.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ah mobile gir gaya sir tab se kuch customer se bhi nahi baat ho raha hai mera sab ID expired sab band hai. Koi call bhi nahi ho pa raha hai.
Executive: Abhi hai aapke paas mobile?
Customer: Ha abhi hai sir.
Executive: Sir aapka IndiaMART ka jo account hai na usme register number ye 75 wala aapka hai sir.
Customer: Ha 75 18 wo jo number jo register number hai wo dusre chhote mobile mein laga ke rakha hun ghar pe hun. Main sham ko agar baat karun aapse to ho jayega kya sir?
Executive: Ah but main ye puch raha tha main samajh nahi paya concern kya hai. Aapka mobile gum ho gaya?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Mobile gum ho gaya aapka?
Customer: Mobile gum ho gaya sir main usi mere hi naam se tha to number dusra nikal liya.
Executive: Number aapke paas hai na 75 wala?
Customer: Ha wo number hai sir.
Executive: To usko usse aap IndiaMART ki application dobara login kar sakte hain kisi naye mobile mein?
Customer: Ha naye mobile mein to mobile to us number se application to maine ye kya kehta hun uska is wale mobile mein to main wo upload kiya tha. Download kiya iska. Kya bolenge?
Executive: Ah.
Executive: Is wale mein aapne nayi application download kar li IndiaMART ki?
Customer: Ha. Ha ha IndiaMART ki main download kar li. Usko login kiya 75 number enter karke?
Customer: Nahi usko to 75 nahi dala tha sir.
Executive: Ah mobile number enter karke login kariye sir. Tab jaake aap access kar payenge kaun kaun si lead aapke paas hai kaun kaun si inquiry aapke paas hai. Ha ha wahi wahi inquiry jitna hai na kuch aa nahi raha hai. Usko main isme laga deta hun tab karo. Aap ek kaam kariye ek bari application open kariye mere kehne pe abhi. Achcha theek hai. Abhi karenge line pe speaker pe lagaiye phone.

Customer: Udhar jo hai na kai baat karte the koi hamare local ke bhi kai IndiaMART mein. Theek hai.
Executive: Open kiya aapne?
Customer: Open kiya. Pravin ji ki keh rahe hain kya?
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Aap Pravin ji ke bare mein puch rahe hain kya?
Customer: Pravin ji. Ah main Pravin sir aaj available nahi tha. Uske main matlab family mein kuch problem thi to wo aaj aapko mil nahi rahe the. To main unka manager baat kar raha hun. Ha to Pravin sir hi bar bar puchte hain to unka number bhi main ghar pe ek mobile mein rakha tha bhai sahab ke paas bhi ek supported number tha na isme dal ke rakha tha. Achcha achcha achcha achcha. Ha ha dhund raha tha main mila nahi fir customer care ko lagaya sir. Koi dikkat nahi hai sir.
Customer: Abhi kya karna hai sir ye bataiye ye home laya hun main. Application open kariye. Ji. Application open kariye. Application khola application ye hai Narendra upar karke nahi teen line aata hai. Ji. Us pe click kariye. Usme number dekhiye kaun sa hai aapka?
Executive: Edit pe click karenge na waha par number dikhega aapko. Is wale mein. Application jo aapne open kari hai. Jab aap three dot pe click karte hain three line pe. Ek second rukiyega.

Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji. Ha sir boliye.
Executive: Application open ki sir aapne?
Customer: Maine kiya sir isme jo hai na pehle jo aa raha tha abhi kya message wagera diya hai view all wagera de raha hai. Mujhe lag raha hai aapne na dusre number se kisi aur number se aapne wo application open kari hai sir. Ha dusra number is mobile mein tha main dal diya usko. Wo wala number aapne dal diya hai sir isliye delete karke download kar lijiye. Ha dobara application ek bari delete matlab wo hata dijiye apne app ke phone se uninstall karke na dobara se isko download karke is bar na jo number aap use kare please wo apna ye wala 75 wala number use kariye sir. Achcha achcha. Tab jaake aapko dikhega kaun kaun si. Pradeep sir ka bhi number hai kya aapke paas? Hmm number main de deta hun aapko koi issue nahi hai. Theek hai theek hai. Vishal sir dijiye na kafi customer mere kitne bhi aa bhi nahi rahe abhi. Wo isliye sir wo dusre mobile mein aapke hai sir dusre wale number se login karoge na usme dikhenge. Isme isliye nahi dikh rahe hain sir. Bada dikkat ho gaya tha. Main aapka number save kar leta hun thoda sa main sham ko ek ghante baad call karta hun aapko. To fir main ye keh raha tha ye concern kya main yaha par close kar sakta hun aapka? Ha aap ye lagaunga to aapka lagega na sir. Aap mujhe same number pe call karoge na to aap mujhe isse connect bhi kar paoge sir. Matlab meri side se to koi pendency nahi hai to agar solution mil chuka hai to main concern ye close kar sakta hun sir. Achcha. Pradeep sir ka number de dijiye na sir. Ha ek minute line pe rukiyega. Pravin hai sir unka naam Pravin. Ha Pravin sir. Aap unka number likhiye. Ji. 77 77 01 01 88 88 98 61 hai kya? Ha bilkul sir sahi same number hai sir. Ha ye aaya tha hamare yaha par theek hai. Ye number aap save rakh lijiyega ye Pravin ji ka hai aur jisse maine call kiya ye mera office ka number hai sir. Aap chaho mujhe isse bhi call kar sakte hain. Sir apna bhi number de dijiye ye lagega na isse? Ha isse bhi call karoge tab bhi mere paas aapka call aayega. Ah ye mera direct office ka hi number hai sir. Theek hai theek hai. Thank you. Ha baki fir main ye concern aapka close kar deta hun aapke paas na ek feedback aayega. Agar aap satisfied hai solution se please waha par satisfied ka feedback mujhe share kariyega sir. Theek hai sir bhej dijiye. Okay sir thank you sir have a nice day sir. Welcome welcome sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's mobile fell, ID expired.

- Unable to see leads and inquiries.

- Wants Pravin's number.



Resolution:

- Explained to log in with registered number.

- Provided Pravin's number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- mobile, application, login, number, leads
